segments.text: I would like to place an order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , Ma'am . What items would you like to order today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have your catalog here . Do you want me to tell you the item numbers , or the names ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may tell me both , Ma'am .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . I want to order the satin sheets on page 28 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Merriman satin sheets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what size would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need one full set of sheets in King-size .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , Ma'am . And what color did you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ivory , please
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So that is product number MS2119 , Size
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think so . Can I ask you something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm a foreigner here . My English isn't perfect . Can you tell me what satin is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Satin is like silk , Ma'am . It feels like silk . But it's a different material .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . That's what I thought .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything else today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I just need the sheets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . With shipping charges , your total will be 68 dollars . Will you be paying with credit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Visa , Master Card , or American Express ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Visa .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Card number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Expiration date ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: July , 2006 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , Ma'am . I will run that charge for you . And then I will get your address in a moment
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
